lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A TWA spokesman said the company has filed an application for approval on its offer to buy USAir with the Department of Transportation, and later today it will file a response to USAir's motion with the DOT to dismiss the TWA application.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While analysts and arbitragers have speculated that Icahn may have made the offer for USAir in order to trigger the acquisition of his own airline, Wall Street today began to take Icahn's effort more seriously.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: TWA said it may acquire additional shares in the open market, in private transactions, through a tender offer or otherwise, subject to Department of Transportation approval.
